oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Government Boulevard on Crest of Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of Government Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga, Tennessee. A carriage can be seen going down the road and a tower is visible in the distance. Features a white bottom border, undivided back, and handwritten correspondence on both sides. March 1, 1907 postmark. Postcard printed in Germany. [No. 2176] This postcard comes from the Tennessee Historical Society Manuscripts Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Carriages & coaches; Mountains; Trees; Towers
